They look to us because we have a rule of law. Because in America, no one is above that law.

Give America a fair trial.

The White House Counsel made several arguments for the President today.
 
But their arguments made the case for additional evidence, documents, and witness testimony even more powerful. 
 
The President’s team has decried an unfair process. So let’s have a fair trial.

If elected, I promise to be the most pro-union president in American history.

Four-year public university tuition in 1965 cost $1,926 a year. Today, it is $9,037 a year.

Taxpayers paid for a trillion-dollar bailout to benefit the crooks on Wall Street.

I think we can afford to make public colleges tuition-free and cancel all student debt.

I don't think massive corporations like Amazon, Delta, Eli Lilly, FedEx, JetBlue and Netflix should continue to get away with paying $0 in federal income taxes.

We're going to make them pay their fair share.

And we're going to invest in the working people of this country.
